argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pmapat.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 2 |  | pmapat.m | |- M = ( pmap ` K ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_pmapat | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A ) -> ( M ` P ) = { P } ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A ) -> ( X e. ( M ` P ) <-> X e. { P } ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_elsnc2g | |- ( P e. A -> ( X e. { P } <-> X = P ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A ) -> ( X e. { P } <-> X = P ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_bitrd | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A ) -> ( X e. ( M ` P ) <-> X = P ) ) |
